title: Designing Flexible Blended Learning Strategies for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Requires time-efficient module designs considering learners’ characteristics as working professionals, accounting for potential variations in technology proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core nursing education concepts with over 80% achievement in a blended learning environment.
Learners can design and execute collaborative learning activities using digital tools (quiz platforms, video conferencing systems, etc.).
Learners can develop and present job-linked case-based projects through flexible learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
